original_text: When you lie down to sleep, you will not be afraid of anyone. Many people will ask you to help them. When you lie down to sleep,
korean_text: 네가 누워도 두렵게 할 자가 없겠고 많은 사람이 네게 은혜를 구하리라

sentences.original_text: When you lie down to sleep
you will not be afraid of anyone
Many people will ask you to help them
sentences.korean_translation: 많은 사람들이 너에게 도움을 청할 것이다

sentences.original_text: When you lie down to sleep
